holidays.title: Amazon Prime Day
holidays.description: The holiday, which is now celebrated annually, features incredible deals designed to rival those of Black Friday.

holidays.title: National Simplicity Day
holidays.description: As Henry Thoreau said: “As you simplify your life, the laws of the universe will be simpler.”

holidays.title: Battle of the Boyne
holidays.description: To commemorate the Battle of Boyne, we take a journey down memory lane.

holidays.title: Etch A Sketch Day
holidays.description: Etch A Sketch Day is an annual event that celebrates the retro toy, Etch A Sketch.

holidays.title: Kiribati National Day
holidays.description: We celebrate this island nation that had an unusual path to independence.

holidays.title: MALALA DAY
holidays.description: Take those hats off, and show some respect as we all celebrate Malala Day.

holidays.title: Mexico: Lawyer's Day
holidays.description: Lawyers champion people’s rights and make sure no one is above the law.

holidays.title: National Different Colored Eyes Day
holidays.description: Heterochromia iridum is the variation in color that gives a single organism two different colored eyes.

holidays.title: National Eat Your Jello Day
holidays.description: Jell-O is a classic dessert we all know and love!

holidays.title: National Hair Creator’s Day
holidays.description: Hair creators and hairstyles mirror the trends of the times they live in.

holidays.title: National Pecan Pie Day
holidays.description: We’re simply nutty over today’s honoree, National Pecan Pie Day.

holidays.title: National Tyler Day
holidays.description: If you are wondering about the name Tyler, we have all the information you need.

holidays.title: New Conversations Day
holidays.description: Warm up your vocal cords as we get ready to make some conversation.

holidays.title: Night of Nights
holidays.description: The Night of Nights carries on the tradition of maritime Morse communication.

holidays.title: Orangemen's Day
holidays.description: Irish Protestants celebrate Orangemen's Day — also known as The Twelfth or Glorious Twelfth.

holidays.title: Paper Bag Day
holidays.description: Save the world one paper bag at a time — we’ll show you how.

holidays.title: Ariana Fletcher’s Birthday
holidays.description: This supermom has pledged her tenacity to her adorable child and her brother Kyle.

holidays.title: Brock Lesnar’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world has something to speak about thanks to W.W.E's ultimate hero.

holidays.title: Donda West’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kanye West changed after his musical inspiration died due to cosmetic surgery.

holidays.title: Kristi Yamaguchi’s Birthday
holidays.description: She slid up the ice as one of the finest figure skaters of all time.

holidays.title: Kyle Forgeard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kyle Forgeard, the multitalented leader of the Nelk Boys, is being honored today.

holidays.title: Richard Simmons’s Birthday
holidays.description: Positive energy reigns in the life of this young entrepreneur, athlete, dancer, activist, and T.V. personality.
